analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/4/0x827d53c8170af52625f414bde00326fc8a085e86.sol:
	Contract BXYToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/4/0x827d53c8170af52625f414bde00326fc8a085e86.sol#217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/4/0x827d53c8170af52625f414bde00326fc8a085e86.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
